txt.en: 'The hills of the North used to be a safe place to hunt, but as of late some of our people have not returned from there.'
'The wild creatures have always been thick in the hills and groves of the Blue Mountains.'
'The Elves and the dwarves leave us to our business for the most part, and we leave them to theirs.'
'Some ask us why we do not travel to Bree-land, where other Men live.'
